name: Little Red Rocket Ship Picross
description:
I've left you all in the dark for a while now.  Sorry for that.  But now, I have unveiled my magnum opus:

Little Red Rocket Ship Picross!

  • 15 LRRS favorites brought to life in several new puzzles to solve!
  • New music tracks!
  • Something else?

Experience LRRS like never before with this new free game you can download and play!

...but I'd check the game files if I were you.

Music Credits:

"Space Circus"

Composed by Brickertown

"On Track (Remix)"

Composed by Random

Arranged by Delta/Random
